title: permanently banned
body: Hello riot. so i have been permanently banned since January i think? all i remember is that i got RP for Christmas and used it on the account, but then i got permanently suspended for toxic behavior. I have improved a lot on my behavior lately, i have been doing anger management lessons and looking at myself now and comparing myself to back then, i can say that i have improved a lot as a person! i would really love to get back into the league of legends community once again and have a second chance as my behavior has changed drastically since then. at the moment i cannot show any results but for you to trust me with this second chance and accept me back into the community i can show you results! i would love to not completely quit this game and taking a massive break from it taught me a lot of things and i believe that i will not let you down!!
